mapper.select: select * from festival order by festivalNum asc

select a.festivalNum, a.festivalName, a.city, a.summary, a.festivalStartDay, a.festivalEndDay, a.mapUrl, a.adress, a.detail, a.homepage, b.country from festival a, city_country b where a.city = b.city and festivalNum = #{num}

select a.festivalNum, a.festivalName, a.city, a.summary, a.festivalStartDay, a.festivalEndDay, a.mapUrl, a.adress, a.detail, a.homepage, b.country from festival a, city_country b where a.city = b.city and festivalName like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by festivalNum asc

select a.festivalNum, a.festivalName, a.city, a.summary, a.festivalStartDay, a.festivalEndDay, a.mapUrl, a.adress, a.detail, a.homepage, b.country from festival a, city_country b where a.city = b.city and (a.city like '%'||#{location}||'%'or b.country like '%'||#{location}||'%') order by festivalNum asc

select a.festivalNum, a.festivalName, a.city, a.summary, a.festivalStartDay, a.festivalEndDay, a.mapUrl, a.adress, a.detail, a.homepage, b.country from festival a, city_country b where a.city = b.city and a.festivalStartDay>=#{festivalStartDay} and a.festivalEndDay <= #{festivalEndDay} order by a.festivalNum asc

select distinct a.festivalNum, a.festivalName, a.city, a.summary, a.festivalStartDay, a.festivalEndDay, a.mapUrl, a.adress, a.detail, a.homepage, d.country from festival a, festival_theme b, theme c ,city_country d where a.festivalNum = b.festivalNum and c.themeName = #{themeName} and c.themeNum = b.themeNum and a.city = d.city order by festivalNum asc
